mapper.insert: #获取insert语句插入时所生成的主键值, id指的是传进来Dish对象Id的值赋值给id属性 insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user,status) values (#{name},#{categoryId},#{price},#{image},#{description},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser},#{status})
